      • apply

        public void apply(int entityId,
                  byte[] settings,
                  java.lang.Integer rotation,
                  java.lang.Integer chunkX,
                  java.lang.Integer chunkY,
                  java.lang.Integer chunkPlane)

        Adds clipping masks to whole region or single chunk based on the settings provided

        Parameters:
        entityId - The region entity
        settings - The map height settings
        rotation - Chunk rotation
        chunkX - Chunk x coordinate
        chunkY - Chunk y coordinate
        chunkPlane - Chunk plane coordinate
